title: Defcon at Devcon: A table top experience
description:
It's 3am and your phone is blowing up—Telegram, Signal, Discord, X—all are saying your project just got rekt. Your team is panicking and begging you to sign off on a quick protocol upgrade. What do you do?

Join our workshop to get hands-on with crisis management in web3. Learn to handle attacks, keep cool under pressure, and manage your stakeholders. By the end, you'll turn this crisis into manageable challenges, protect your project, and keep building.
